item.title: Build your first Web App for Data Visualization
item.description: Build your first Web App for Data Visualization using Vue.js! In this article we’re using two modern tools for Data Visualization using Javascript: Vue.js - about vuejs eCharts - about echarts Assumptions: Minimal knowledge of Javascript; We are using free and open-source software package manager to simplify the installation of software. Here we’ll use Homebrew (macOS >= 10.14 or Linux). You can use other package manager for your OS or install Node and Yarn following their instructions. 1. Javascript (Node + Package Manager) Setup: Cleanup previously installed packages. Using Homebrew: brew uninstall --force yarn node npm brew cleanup brew update Install Node.
